title: Need help with account info
body: I went to check how much I've spent on league Over time and it only said I spent $295 but I know it's way more because I've spent more then that in 1 month

replies.body: You should be able to get a precise list of your purchase history through the [privacy page](https://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/).  Heads up though there may be a small processing fee to get that ready for you!
